Hello, Arik!

I've recently found that "GalleryPropertiesProvider.cs" contains a bad bug. The result is that DropDownGallery doesn't fill (try "09-Galleries" example in v2.5). The bug has appeared somewhere between builds 45275 and 50068 (after fixing bugs related to gallery controls, actually :( ).

Please, fix it as soon as you can!

Thanks a lot.

I'm working on it.
It's definitely a bug that was caused by a fix to a previous bug related to combobox.

I need to find a way to solve both bugs simultaneously.
I'll update here when this is solved.

Thank you very much!

I've been translating your blog post about galleries, and so found this bug. Now waiting for a fix :)

Which language are you translating to?

Would be nice to have a link.
